Title: Monty Python Live at the Hollywood Bowl
Writer: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle, Terry Jones, Michael Palin, Tim Brooke-Taylor (additional material), Marty Feldman (additional material), Angus James (additional material), David Lipscomb (additional material)
Actors: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle
Plot: A collection of skits that made the Python troup famous, performed live at the Hollywood Bowl. Included are the singing philosophers, lumberjacks, the pope, and a suspiciously-male looking seabird vendor.
